entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:25 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:25 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:25 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
